    A

    AboutPanel - Class in Unnamed Package
    A modeless, scroll-enabled panel that presents company information about Litera.
    AboutPanel(CardLayout, JPanel) - Constructor for class AboutPanel
     
    aehnlich(Buch) - Method in class Buchkatalog
    Finds similar books based on genre matches.
    aehnlich(String) - Method in interface ApplicationInterface
     
    aehnlich(String) - Method in class Controller
    Returns books that are similar (≥3 matching genres) to the reference book with the given ID.
    ApplicationInterface - Interface in Unnamed Package
    Defines all operations that the presentation layer performs with the business logic.
    ApplicationWindow - Class in Unnamed Package
    Main window of the application.
    ApplicationWindow(ApplicationInterface) - Constructor for class ApplicationWindow
    Constructor – creates the window, screens and displays the start card.
    Autor - Class in Unnamed Package
    Represents an author of a book.
    Autor() - Constructor for class Autor
    No-argument constructor.
    Autor(String) - Constructor for class Autor
    Constructor with parameter – to easily create an author with a name.

    B

    BookDetails - Class in Unnamed Package
    Panel that shows a single Buch together with: basic metadata (title, author, publisher, genres, description, cover) a (dynamically sized) list of reviews a horizontal carousel of similar books
    BookDetails(CardLayout, JPanel, ApplicationInterface) - Constructor for class BookDetails
    Constructs the detail panel and wires UI to the given controller.
    BookListPanel - Class in Unnamed Package
    List of all books with search and filter options.
    BookListPanel(CardLayout, JPanel, ApplicationInterface) - Constructor for class BookListPanel
     
    Buch - Class in Unnamed Package
    Model class for books.
    Buch() - Constructor for class Buch
    Default constructor (required by Jackson).
    buchdetails(String) - Method in interface ApplicationInterface
    Returns the complete details of a book.
    buchdetails(String) - Method in class Controller
     
    buchDetails(String) - Method in class Buchkatalog
    Returns a single book by its ID.
    Buchkatalog - Class in Unnamed Package
    This class contains the business logic for searching and filtering books as well as accessing reviews (ratings).
    Buchkatalog(StorageService) - Constructor for class Buchkatalog
    Constructor – loads books from the provided StorageService.
    buchsuche(String) - Method in interface ApplicationInterface
    Searches for books whose titles contain the given string.
    buchsuche(String) - Method in class Buchkatalog
    Searches for books by title.
    buchsuche(String) - Method in class Controller
     

    C

    Controller - Class in Unnamed Package
    Thin control layer that exposes the book catalog via the ApplicationInterface.
    Controller(StorageService) - Constructor for class Controller
     

    G

    Genre - Class in Unnamed Package
    Represents a genre of a book, e.g., "Fantasy" or "Crime", along with a short description.
    Genre() - Constructor for class Genre
    No-argument constructor – required by frameworks like Jackson that create objects automatically from JSON data.
    Genre(String, String) - Constructor for class Genre
    Constructor with parameters for directly setting name and description.

    SimilarBooks - Class in Unnamed Package

    speichereRezension(Rezension) - Method in class StorageService
    Persists a new review.
    Existing reviews are loaded, the new one is added, and then the full list is written back.
    StartPanel - Class in Unnamed Package

    StorageService - Class in Unnamed Package
    Service class for file operations:
    • loads books and reviews from JSON files
    • persistently saves new reviews
